mapper.select:
select * from calendar where (cldr_category = #{CLDR_CATEGORY} or cldr_category = #{userId})
and cldr_start >= to_date(#{CLDR_START}, 'YYYY-MM') and cldr_start <= add_months(to_date(#{CLDR_START}, 'YYYY-MM'),1)-1
order by CLDR_START
mapper.insert:
select 'CLDR'||SEQ_CLDR_CODE.nextval from dual
insert into calendar values(#{groupId},#{title},#{content},to_date(#{start},'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:MI'),to_date(#{end},'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:MI'),#{allDay},#{color},#{memNo},#{category},#{check})
